name: Virtual Family Doctor Hospital
description:
Welcome to the free Virtual Hospital Doctor simulator game!
Are you excited to become the virtual hospital doctor simulator in doctor games? Virtual hospital game is an amazing game which allows you to cure your way through quirkiest and funniest diseases in virtual hospital doctor simulator games. You have to deal with the virtual hospital villagers families in hospital games. Being as doctor it is your duty to have surgery of the patience, operate the children and little baby in this doctor and dentist games. Take control of the city in this hospital or doctor games and build medical center(Clinic), hire nurses and doctors to provide best treatments to the patience like to have surgery, cure the dangerous disease of baby, kids and provide dentist facilities as well in virtual hospital doctor simulator games.
